info.description: This is the Rest API documentation for the endpoints which are exposed in Elrond Network's node.
info.title: Elrond Network Node

tags.name: node
tags.description: All endpoints related to the node group

get.summary: Returns live details about node's status

200.description: Successful request. Data should be returned in a json format

400.description: Request fail. It seems like a bad request

404.description: The node is down or the API service is not working. Also, a wrong link could have been provided

500.description: Internal server error. Something went wrong

get.summary: Returns details about all the peers in the network

200.description: Successful request. Data should be returned in a json format

400.description: Request fail. It seems like a bad request

404.description: The node is down or the API service is not working. Also, a wrong link could have been provided

500.description: Internal server error. Something went wrong

get.summary: Get data about the account for the provided address
get.description: As an input it will take a 32 bytes long address

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address you want the data for. Should be a correct hash.

400.description: Request fail. It seems like a bad request

404.description: The node is down or the API service is not working. Also, a wrong link could have been provided

500.description: Internal server error. Something went wrong

post.summary: Send a transaction (if valid) to the network
post.description: As an input it will take a transaction in json format

parameters.name: transaction
parameters.description: Transaction object that needs to be sent to the network
